content: > **buy 3 get 1 free place 4 of my patterns in your cart and the 4th > least expensive will be free no > coupon code needed ** > > **let s stay in touch ** > subscribe to my > newsletter https //www tellybeanknits com/newsletter-sign-up > &#9829 follow me on instagram > @tellybeanknits *since the yarn used for this pattern is still a secret all the photos in this pattern are currently in black & white an updated full-color version of this pattern will be released at the end of december * smallidays is a charming knitted ornament collection that brings extra warmth and whimsy to the holiday season each tiny design is quick festive and perfect for turning leftover bits of scrap yarn into something magical it s the perfect project for working through an advent yarn kit letting you savor a new color each day while filling your tree with handmade cheer you can even string these ornaments together to create a cheerful advent garland with every stitch smallidays captures the cozy spirit of christmas in adorable miniature form this pattern includes a miniature sweater hat mitten and scarf pattern the pattern also includes a quick photo tutorial for adding a tassel to your hat and fringe to your scarf to create this little ornament collection i worked in collaboration with emma s yarn https //emmasyarn com using the smallidays 2025 - simply spectacular dk kit https //emmasyarn com/collections/2025-smalliday-set but you do not need an advent kit to enjoy this pattern the smallidays ornaments are the perfect project for stash diving **sizes** one size teensy weensy ornament size see finished dimensions below **yarn** dk weight yarn emma s yarn simply spectacular dk smalls 75% superwash merino wool & 25% nylon 50 yards / 0 7 oz 46 meters / 20 grams sample shown in 2025 smallidays dk advent kit mini hat 25 yards / 23 meters mini sweater 45 yards / 41 meters mini mitten 20 yards / 18 meters mini scarf 15 yards / 14 meters **finished dimensions** *mini hat* width flat without tassel 4 inches / 10 cm length 3 25 inches / 8 cm *mini sweater* chest width flat 3 5 inches / 9 cm length 4 inches / 10 cm *mini mitten* palm width flat 2 25 inches / 5 5 cm length 3 25 inches / 8 cm *mini scarf* width 1 5 inches 3 5 cm length without fringe 7 5 inches 19 cm **needles** us 5 3 75mm or as required to meet gauge dpns or preferred needle size for small circumference knitting **gauge** *for the hat mitten and sweater* 22 sts & 32 rounds = 4 inches 10cm in stockinette in the round after blocking *for scarf* 22 sts & 40 row = 4 inches 10cm in garter stitch after blocking **tools** 8 stitch markers for the sweater / 3 stitch markers for the mini mitten / 1 stitch marker for the mini hat scrap yarn tapestry needle
